overview: The bedroom—the space in which one comes back to one's intimacy, sleep and also perhaps disappointments—serves as a setting to compose the filmmaker’s fragmented portrait. A woman seeks to understand love, sorrow and absence between the folds of sheets, which are intended to keep lovers’ secrets. Davina Maria tries to find her image just as one makes or unmakes one’s bed. A quest for oneself and a harrowing diary.
title: Lits défaits
